alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 12:03PM EDT until March 21 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Paducah, Olmsted Lock and Cairo. .The Ohio River at Paducah, Olmstead, and Cairo are cresting at this time and should begin a very slow fall this week. Paducah and Cairo should fall below minor flood stage on Wednesday, with Olmstead expected to fall below minor flood stage next weekend. For the Ohio River...including Smithland Dam, Paducah, Olmsted Lock and Dam, Cairo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH MONDAY, MARCH 21... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until Monday, March 21. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 44.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday evening and continue falling to 36.3 feet Wednesday, March 23. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
